channel.title: How do you transfer characters from EasyRSC to RSCA?
channel.description: So Kryptix advised that I switch from EasyRSC to RSCA. I would love to do this if I can figure out how to transfer all of the accounts that have been created. Any ideas how?

item.title: How do you transfer characters from EasyRSC to RSCA?
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Going back to DQ revision 25 and trying to figure out something and working with his version of the client… ugh. Now I remember how much of a headache it was to get that working.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you transfer characters from EasyRSC to RSCA?

item.title: How do you transfer characters from EasyRSC to RSCA?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“cleako, post:11, topic:416893”]http://www.assembla.com/code/darkquest/subversion/node/logs?

I’ll have to see what was done in MoparClassic, looks like July had some commits. I only saw the first few back in the spring.

Edit: Looks like Lothy has been working on a C RSC emulator or two. Neat.[/quote]Most of the logs are useless seeing the descriptions are linking to a site isn’t around anymore.

Read full topic

item.source: How do you transfer characters from EasyRSC to RSCA?

item.title: How do you transfer characters from EasyRSC to RSCA?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“cleako, post:9, topic:416893”]As much as you might have your heart set on RSCA, take a look at DarkQuest too. You might want to revert back a few revisions from when Peeter ended the project before the points system was implemented but overall it is basically RSCA but with many fixes and improvements. For me it as a lot less frustrating as RSCA came with a lot of bugs that had to be fixed before it was really playable. Grab Tortoise SVN client and check out:

http://www.assembla.com/code/darkquest/subversion/nodes

Latifundio has worked with it and he likes it a lot too.[/quote]What fixes and improvements?

Also, you should probably look at the MoparClassic project on GitHub.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you transfer characters from EasyRSC to RSCA?

item.title: How do you transfer characters from EasyRSC to RSCA?
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

As much as you might have your heart set on RSCA, take a look at DarkQuest too. You might want to revert back a few revisions from when Peeter ended the project before the points system was implemented but overall it is basically RSCA but with many fixes and improvements. For me it as a lot less frustrating as RSCA came with a lot of bugs that had to be fixed before it was really playable. Grab Tortoise SVN client and check out:

http://www.assembla.com/code/darkquest/subversion/nodes

Latifundio has worked with it and he likes it a lot too.

Read full topic
